data.message: Everyone is allowed to have their opinion. Its what makes the world go round. Homosexuality is not my preference but i accept it. Who am I to judge? God is the only one who can judge. So the ppl who judge homosexuality pray for yourselves.  You are not higher and it does not make you a better person.

replies.message: That's true! But God has already Judged! either you repent of sin or you don't! I chose to repent of all my sins! In the eyes of God that does make us better people!
Eu te amo. Quero te encontrar.
